name: Body Oil
description:
NEW! Suriishae bath and body oil! Lightweight moisturizer, bath oil and massage oil. This body oil is non greasy and penetrates the skin leaving it soft, silky and supple. Natural oils like Wheatgerm, Avocado, Sweet Almond and Jojoba will restore protect and nourish your skin.

Massage into damp skin after bathing!  Can also be used as a hair oil.

Ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil, Avocado Oil, Wheatgerm Oil, Meadowfoam Oil, Jojoba Oil, Olive Oil, Essential Oil , fragrance, Vitamin E

name: Nourish OLIO
description:
Nourishing hair OLIO (oil) is great for sealing in moisture after shampooing.  
Olive Oil, is one of the top emollients that can penetrate the hair better than others, and its lightweight nature makes it great for moisturizing.  It contains anti-inflammatory properties that promote scalp health and prevent dandruff. 
Precious Argan oil absorbs into your hair instantly, penetrating the roots and adding elasticity to damage and dry hair.  With it absorbing so quickly, it penetrates the cells and roots restoring your hairs natural shine.
Grapeseed oil for hair contains anti-oxidants and is very rich in other nutrients which make it one of the most preferable hair oils for damaged hair.
Rosemary essential oil stimulates circulation to the scalp and destroys any bacteria that could clog hair follicles. As an added hair care bonus, it increases hair shine.
Bergamot Oil is know to strengthen hair that is thin, dull, or breaks easily.  When applied to hair, bergamot oil reportedly soaks into the scalp and strands. This stimulates the blood flow to the follicles around the roots and infuses into strands to give hair strength and shine. 
Clary sage essential oil is one of the natural hair growth boosters. It will stop the hair loss, prevent baldness, promote hair growth and make the hair stronger and shiny.

NourishOLIO hair oil will add shine, moisture and softness to you hair.  It is lightweight and non greasy. It protects against heat from blowdryers, flatirons, can be used as an  oil treatment.

 Uses: Moisturiser for hair and scalp, Pre shampoo treatment, hot oil treatment.  Apply a small amount to the palm of your hands, rub together, and apply to wet or dry hair, from roots to ends.  A very little goes a long way.

Ingredients: *Olive Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Castor Oil *Argania Spinosa (Argan Oil), Broccoli Seed Oil, essential oils of Rosemary, Clary Sage and Bergamot
(*states certified organic ingredient)

100% natural product

Warnings: For external use only.  Keep out of reach of children.

name: DEAD SEA Salt Scrub
description:
DEAD SEA Salt Scrub! Ultra fine Dead Sea Salts, with Madagascar Vanilla Essential Oil. Vanilla oil is the call for earthy and sensual pleasures. Vanilla is Soothing and harmonizing to the fire element in us; it stabilizes emotions and consoles when sadness or grief seems to overpower us. Delightful sweetness of the tropics with a seductive kiss of the earth. Dead Sea salt is filled with natural healing elements which are known to treat, detoxify, and cleanse our bodies.


Directions for use:Cleanse first, and then use scrub. Gently rub onto skin in a light circular motion. Rinse with warm water. Pat yourself dry so that you do not remove the moisture from the natural oils. If intending to shave, scrub first and shave after, as the salts will cause the shaved area to sting.  Use no more than two times a week.

name: Shea Nilotica Butter (Certified Organic)
description:
Our Nilotica Shea Butter is a premium shea butter and is a subspecies of paradoxa (West African) shea and is perhaps the creamiest, most luxurious shea butter available.  The Organic Nilotica Shea Nuts are collected by local women’s collecting cooperatives within East Africa from organically certified trees. These Nuts are then transported to Kenya, where they are cold-pressed and no further processing is required to produce this most exquisite, distinct and beautiful butter. This production process ensures that the butter retains its many unique properties.

It has a rather unique fatty acid profile that gives it some remarkable moisturising properties.  It can help to retain skin elasticity and is incredibly useful for treating very dry, cracked and sun damaged-skin as well as psoriasis and eczema.  It can also help to reduce stretch marks.

Nilotica is a wonderful addition to hair care products (particularly for damaged, dry and brittle hair).  Can be used alone or as part of a formulation for dry lips. 

It is also beneficial in helping to reduce swelling and inflammation and so is excellent for use in formulations for muscular aches and pains.

Nilotica is premium shea butter with some very distinct properties and advantages over paradoxa. 

· Lower melting point (15c – 18c)
· Superior texture (very soft and creamy)
· Higher nutritive value
· Non-sticky
· Milder/lighter nutty aroma
· Incredibly moisturising
· More readily absorbed into the skin and hair
· Higher olein content
· Minimal processing

Nilotica has a lower melting point to paradoxa and so is more sensitive to heat.  Please be aware that during transit, there is a possibility that it will be exposed to temperature changes causing it to melt.  When it resets, it may develop a gritty texture (quite common with shea as well as some other natural butters).  Sit in refrigerator for 10-15 or until butter solidifies.

Store in a cool dry place away from heat.


Usage level up to 100%
I personally use it as an all over body moisturizer and LOVE it!  Reminds me of Vanilla Ice Cream. :)

name: 100% Organic Argan Oil
description:
ORGANIC ARGAN OIL
(Argania spinosa)
Native to Morocco.  Argan oil is obtained from the fruit of the thorny Argan tree which has been used for centuries by the Berber tribe of Morocco.

SuriiShae Organic Argan Oil is 100% Pure with no additives. 100% Pure Moroccan Argan Oil is loaded with vitamins A & E and is rich in anti-aging squalene.  Our cold pressed, 100% Pure Moroccan Argan Oil has an amazing ability to repair skin and provides all day protection against moisture loss. No other oil performs as well at protecting the skin and reversing present signs of aging as argan which refuses to bear fruit anywhere other than the Sahara of Morocco. 

It won't clog your pores, is non-greasy and absorbs into skin upon contact, which will offer hours of moisture protection.  
Argan oil is traditionally used to regenerate the skin.
 
SuriiShae Argan Oil can also be used to condition cuticles and moisturise the hair. It's great at reducing frizz and repairing dry/damaged hair/split ends. When applied to skin, it helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and blemishes.

When applying to face, only 1-2 drops is necessary!  Use after cleaning your face at night and in the morning
Apply to damp or dry hair (2-4 drops should suffice) 1-2 drops only on finer hair.

Our organic argan oil solidifies under colder temperatures due to the presence of palmitic + stearic 
Simply place bottle in warm water to melt!

name: SuriiBaby Whipped Body Butter
description:
Our TOP selling butter!  SuriiBaby Whipped Body Butter! Named after my son Surii because of his sensitive skin!  Moisture packed for adults, yet still gentle enough for kids and those with sensitive skin! This thick and rich creamy moisturiser will leave your skin feeling hydrated and replenished for hours.  Most people say they're skin is supple all day long without having to reapply!

Our whipped butters contain 100% natural and organic ingredients, with Unrefined Shea Butter as the main ingredient and can be used from head to toe!

Great for dry skin, eczema, diaper rash, burns, psoriasis,  as a hair moisturizer and more.

Smooth on to damp skin after shower/bathing to lock in extra moisture!

Ingredients:  Unrefined Shea butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E

name: Au Naturale' (Unrefined Shea Butter)
description:
SuriiShae Naturals  GRADE A Unrefined, Certified Organic Shea butter is the best of the best!  Our butters have gone through a series of lab testing and comes with certification, to be sure you receive the best quality.
Made from shea nuts from trees that grow wild from West Africa.  These trees are grown without pesticides or chemicals.

Shea Butter can be used to provide deep moisture to extra dry skin. My skin LOVES it! Some say that it works really well on ezcema.  Try it for yourself, your skin will love you for it!
 It contains no chemicals, additives, or colors.  It has a light nutty scent to it.  Some refer to it as a light, chocolate scent.  Ours is ivory/slightly yellow in color.

Great when used on damp skin after showering!  My heels get hard from standing all day as a hairstylist, so I put my shea on my feet after bathing while feet are still damp and sleep in socks to keep them supple and soft!

Melt shea in between hands before application for better glide.

Suriishae Shea butters should be stored in a cool, dry and dark place.  Avoid leaving in cars or hot areas, to keep shea from melting.  If your shea should melt, simply stick it in the fridge until it solidifies!
Shea Butters vary in color, can sometimes be grainy, and can change slightly from batch to batch.  If you see slight changes in your shea (ivory to yellowish) don't be alarmed, as this is normal.
